title: Emily Hunt Articles | Similarweb
description: Looking for articles written by Emily Hunt? Check out all of Emily Hunt's insightful articles on the Similarweb blog, enter now!
content: HomeBlogEmily Hunt Market Research & eCommerce Specialist Emily Hunt Emily Hunt is a Content Marketing Manager on the Shopper Intelligence team, Similarweb's eCommerce solution. Her writing covers digital retail, CPG, travel, and consumer finance. Emily also has a background in business development, digital, and field marketing. She is based in New York City with two, big fluffy dogs (see if you can spot their photos in her writing).
